channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Thousands of Palestinians return by foot to rubble as Gaza ceasefire takes hold

item.title: Klarna CEO halved his workforce to make way for AI—now, he’s warning workers that other ‘tech bros’ are sugarcoating just how badly it’s about to impact jobs
item.description: Sebastian Siemiatkowski, who told Sam Altman he wanted Klarna to be ChatGPT’s “favorite guinea pig,” says too many CEOs are downplaying how disruptive...

item.title: The Fiscal Gambit at the Center of the Shutdown
item.description: It is a well-worn strategy to temporarily create a government benefit and hope that its eventual expiration will create a standoff like the shutdown f...

item.title: Shonda Rhimes and Warren Buffett share the same spending habit: They both still use coupons—despite a combined $149.2 billion net worth
item.description: Multimillionaire ‘Bridgerton’ producer Shonda Rhimes still hunts for bargains because ‘absolutely nothing’ changes when your dreams come true.

item.title: What Courts Have Said in Challenges to Trump’s National Guard Deployments
item.description: Federal courts across the country have heard legal challenges to the mobilization of troops in Los Angeles, Washington, Portland, Ore., and Chicago. H...

item.title: Iran Lures Transgender Foreigners for Surgery but Forces Operations on Locals

item.title: Bitcoin is ‘not an asset’ and has ‘no intrinsic value,’ says $225 billion investment company
item.description: HL is the third large financial institution recently to remind customers that crypto might be based on nothing, following Deutsche Bank and Elliott Ma...

item.title: Gaza Cease-Fire Begins, Israel Says, as Thousands Return to the North
item.description: The Israeli military’s announcement of a pause in fighting brought a mass movement of people heading home to Gaza City and its surroundings.

item.title: Jeff Bezos says stress comes from ‘ignoring things you shouldn’t be ignoring,’ not hard work: ‘You can be working incredibly hard and loving it’
item.description: "Likewise, you can be out of work and incredibly stressed over that," the Amazon founder added.

item.title: Aid Groups Prepare to Provide Quick Relief to Gaza Under Cease-Fire
item.description: The new Israel-Hamas deal contains provisions to increase aid to Gaza, and for the reopening of a border crossing from Egypt.

item.title: Venezuela’s María Corina Machado Is Awarded 2025 Nobel Peace Prize

item.title: Unable to celebrate openly, Venezuelans quietly honor the country’s first Nobel laureate.
item.description: Most Venezuelans saw María Corina Machado’s Peace Prize as a recognition of their economic struggles and democratic hopes.

item.title: Live Updates: María Corina Machado of Venezuela Is Awarded the Nobel Peace Prize
